page.title: 07FARMING
page.content: There are 18 {farms}in our area and we were able to get information from 14 of them.The other four were to far away from us to contact.Twelve of the eighteen farms are {dairy farms}making their money out of milk,one is a mixed farm and the other five are{beef {farms.}The farms vary in size from 40 to 186 acres,and the {average size}is 118 acres.The average number in the milking herd is sixty cows and they are nearly all{Friesians.}The milk mostly goes to North Tawton collected by a{tanker}each day.Nearly all the farms are all in{grass},with about one fifth {cereals} for winter feed.Between three and four{tractors} are kept on every farm and Fords and Massey Fergussons are the favourite sorts.
